name: Live Free
description:
Theme Interpretation:

You are diving deeper and deeper into depression but there's hope! Pick up the encouraging words and punch depression to have victory over it.

Controls:

  • A/D or Left/Right Arrows to move
  • Use Mouse to select the "Word" to complete the encouragement 

Objective:

  • Collect 3 words to engage depression in battle
  • Chose the right word that completes the sentence
  • Do this 3 times to defeat depression
  • Dodge the Doubt blocks or you will lose the battle
